level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1102(d) of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 1202 of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-144, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1219.01.
